title: Would the 12% decrease in damage from Ninja tabi take away from Thornmail damage?
body: I got kind of confused thinking about it

replies.body: No, because thornmail damage is neither an auto attack nor physical damage.

Thornmail's return damage is calculated before damage mitigation applies.

It wouldn't be affected.
Yes, it takes from thornmail damage.

I'm convinced thornmail is a placebo effect item.

The only person it tricked into working was Rammus. But Rammus don't care, he never really cared. He was just okay getting something nice.
